testsuite.name: oradb::cleanpath With invalid parameters with non string parameter

testcase.name: oradb::cleanpath With invalid parameters with non string parameter should run oradb::cleanpath(["a"]) and raise an ArgumentError with the message matching /expects a String value/
oradb::cleanpath With invalid parameters with non string parameter should run oradb::cleanpath(false) and raise an ArgumentError with the message matching /expects a String value/
oradb::cleanpath With invalid parameters with non string parameter should run oradb::cleanpath(42) and raise an ArgumentError with the message matching /expects a String value/
